content:
Nice work, i like it :)
Maybe suitable for reverse, isn't it?

Without knowing that these numbers are hours one only need to discover, that the results is sum of range sizes without counting overlapping parts multiple times.

See this solution http://pastebin.com/AVReiBwf doesn't care for 0-24 constrait.

What do you think?

I love that one! Approved on my side.
@[K]Gabor: It's a bit too hard to find the logic to reverse it, don't you think?

I also think that the reverse mode is a little bit too hard.
I thought about your solution, I think there is a lot of different solutions, some of them like this one are good for short code ;)
I suppose you guys right. It is hard to tell, after saw the statement, how difficult it would be. :) It just seemed easier to me, than some of those already came to me in live clash.
